1 ally with the highest SP deals +5% damage to targets with less than 0 SP
If the target has less than 0 SP, deal even more damage the further the target's SP is from 0 (+0.5% per SP, max 20%)
If the target does not have SP, the said ally inflicts +1 more Sinking and Sinking Count with the Skill and Coin Effects of their Attack Skills (2 times per turn)

<2>Spend 1 Ammo
<3>Spend 1 Ammo

[On Crit] Inflict 1 Pierce Fragility next turn (Once per turn)

[On Crit] At 30+ Poise, consume up to 10 excess Poise; deal +(Poise consumed x 10)% damage
